p: Several studies of synthetic drug use among MSM in China have, similar to our findings, reported that MSM users of synthetic drugs tend to be young and single [ 15– 17, 19, 20]. and have higher levels of educational attainment [ 16, 17]. Furthermore, several studies support our finding of increased high-risk sexual behavior among synthetic drug users compared to non-users—users being more likely to have increased numbers of male sex partners, engage in commercial sex and group sex, and have unprotected sex [ 15, 17, 19, 20].
